system.description:
Force measures your raw physical strength, used for tasks such as lifting heavy objects, breaking down doors, or overpowering opponents in a grapple.

You make a Force test when you attempt to apply your physical power to accomplish a task. If multiple people are working together, you can transfer your successes to others, improving their chances of success.

Extra Successes Can Be Used To:

  • Dominate Opponent – Gain an advantageous position in a grapple or melee.
  • Disarm Opponent – Force your opponent to drop their weapon or item.
  • Cause Damage – Inflict additional damage to an object or structure.
  • Create Opening – Distract or unbalance your opponent, setting them up for an ally’s attack.
  • Perform Feats of Strength – Accomplish extraordinary physical feats beyond the usual scope of the task.
